video.title: Sense8
video.synopsis: From the creators of "The Matrix" and "Babylon 5" comes this tense series in which eight people can telepathically experience each other's lives.

episodes.synopsis: Eight strangers from cities around the globe begin having experiences that defy explanation.
episodes.title: Limbic Resonance

episodes.synopsis: Nomi's fortunes take a dark turn, while the rest of the Sensates' connections become stronger and more dangerous.
episodes.title: I Am Also a We

episodes.synopsis: With many of the Sensates' lives becoming more complicated, their newfound gift -- while still a mystery -- proves vital for survival.
episodes.title: Smart Money Is on the Skinny Bitch

episodes.synopsis: Nomi's fate draws nearer, Capheus and Wolfgang's fortunes seem to have turned, but Sun is faced with an impossible choice.
episodes.title: What’s Going On?

episodes.synopsis: The Sensates struggle with intensifying connections, which results in some interesting days on set for Lito and a wedding day surprise for Kala.
episodes.title: Art Is Like Religion

episodes.synopsis: While the Sensates bond, Nomi takes a bold move to gain her freedom and Sun makes a choice she might someday regret.
episodes.title: Demons

episodes.synopsis: Nomi makes a shocking discovery about her former doctor, while Will gets closer to the truth behind his visions and Kala's doubts grow stronger.
episodes.title: W. W. N. Double D?

episodes.synopsis: Sun fights to adjust to her new life as Capheus tries to change his. Will and Nomi dig up disturbing information that could change everything.
episodes.title: We Will All Be Judged by the Courage of Our Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Riley learns about her new life and its dangers, Kala deals with the aftermath of the attack on Rajan’s father, and Lito's world spins out of control.
episodes.title: Death Doesn’t Let You Say Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Will learns more about his origins and the threat to his future, while Wolfgang's actions catch up with him, even as his bond with Kala strengthens.
episodes.title: What Is Human?

episodes.synopsis: Riley's fate draws nearer, while Capheus and Sun are put to the test, and Wolfgang makes his boldest move yet.
episodes.title: Just Turn the Wheel and the Future Changes

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, with Riley in the hands of Whispers, all of the Sensates' skills are needed to give them any chance at survival.
episodes.title: I Can’t Leave Her
